items.title: Big Tech ETF posts big drop, as Tesla sees steep slide
items.description: Big Tech ETF posts big drop, as Tesla sees steep slide

items.title: Amazon stock falls as Raymond James downgrades shares, citing tariff headwinds and 'limited' AI monetization
items.description: Amazon shares fell as much as 4% Monday after Raymond James downgraded the stock to an Overperform rating from a Strong Buy.
